评论概述: Very cute, but not for long term wear.
评论详情: I bought this for a rave I was going to. I only wore the smaller middle piece and loved the look. Was slightly annoyed with it rubbing against my teeth, but it wasn't a huge deal. Easy to bend and fit to your lip. Good quality.

So having this lip clip wasn’t all that it lived up to be. It’s fashionable, sure! But it’s hard to keep it on without it constantly sliding up and off your lip when you’re talking. Your lip is a muscle, so it’s constantly changing shape as you talk, and it tends to make the clip move around a bit, and it gets annoying when your adjusting the clip every 20 seconds. Just get your lip pierced. lol It’s great if you want to be a stoic-mute at a nightclub, and not do a lot of talking. But I would probably use this more as photo-candy for those unique shoots.

The quality is good, looks and comes as described. It was very uncomfortable to wear and got in the way. Its a pretty sold metal to bend and make adjustments. Also not sure if it looked good for my face type (round) so keep that in mind when purchasing.

I love this piece and plan to order more. It's a sturdy enough metal to keep its shape but bendable by hand so you can make it perfectly contour around your lip. Like anything with a close fit, a little tinkering is to be expected, everyone's face is different. But once I angled it to fit it has stayed perfect through nights out at events and photoshoots and not chipped or tarnished. Very pleased with this product.

I like this piece of jewelry. It fits well. Don't expect to do too much talking with it. I'm my experience if you lucky enough for it to fit perfectly not much talking, no eating and no smiling. Maybe a slight smile but too much movement and that perfect fit becomes a nuisance and quickly moves out of place.

Ok let me be clear, you can wear ONE at a time. Wearing both makes my lip fall down and open ala Bubba Gino. But they’re cute. Just know that before you buy.

评论概述: Looks cool but not the most practical
评论详情: Came in neat packaging, looks and feels just how I expected. The material is slightly flexible but not delicate, it will only bend if you want it to. I used jewelry pliers to mold it to my nose. At home it had good grip and didn’t fall off even when looking down. I wore it out to a concert and got lots of compliments on it, the only issue is as soon as my face got slightly sweaty and I started talking to people (causing the skin around my nose to shift) the nose jewelry kept slipping off, so it unfortunately spent the rest of the night in my pocket. I’m thinking of trying to wear it with spirit gum or another skin safe adhesive. For a photo shoot, modeling, or any scenario where you’re not scrunching your face then slippage is less of an issue.
I got lots of compliments on the lip ring. It's not the most comfortable fit but I got used to it over time.

I always wanted to wear lip wraps but never wanted to get a piercing to achieve the look. This is perfect since I can put it on whenever I want without having to get my lip pierced. It is very cute but difficult to wear while eating so I take it off then.
